ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: As your skill in whatever spell you cast improves.. you ll get better at that.  It happens to me all the time, while gating..  All I have to do is get the
ygData.messageBody:
As your skill in whatever spell you cast improves.. you'll get better at that. It happens to me all the time, while gating.. All I have to do is get the first two bubbles of my gate spell off without being interrupted.. and the last 4 bubbles always completes, whether or not I've been hit. I've even actually been hit for over 100 damage and still regained concentration enough to finish the spell and gate.

This has been this way for about a week or two now.. so it couldnt've been that last patch. (my opinion of course)

Drev

> ----------
> From: John Penman[SMTP:jpenman@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 8:43 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Unfair?
>
> From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>
>
> Well I think they have taken some of this in to consideration because it
> seems they added somehting new to last nights patch. During the game last
> night I received a message while in combat taht stated "You regained
> concentration" and it cast my spells after it told me I lost concentration.
> Could be the first steps...? Who knows.
>
> Shadair
